question: Did you use AI tools in creating this solution?
You can assume that a paragraph that starts with the word “Question” marks the beginning of a question.
Assume that each question will have 4 answer choices labelled A,B,C,D.

--	Assume this is to be used at a live event where 1000 participants were rotating through 50 stations over the course of a few hours – each station has a facilitator with an iPad and uses this app to ask the participants the questions and record their answers.
Assume we want to collect aggregated statistics at the end.
